overview: Guess what's for dessert? 6 sweet white girls in 5 freaky scenes!  Hillary Scott and Leah love to get their fill of cocoa butter and then some when they take on Mandingo - whose sexual appetite devours both of their tasty white treats. Brian Pumper gets a piece of sweet young Alex Divine, then snatches Barbara Summers for a second helping of dessert, each in their own finger-licking scene!
title: White Chocolate
